title: Broadcast task-status SSE events
description:
When a task status changes, broadcast a new SSE event type to connected clients.

Event schema:
{
  "type": "task-status",
  "tickId": "7o7",
  "taskListId": "ece9240d-...",
  "taskId": "1",
  "status": "in_progress",
  "activeForm": "Adding email validation"
}

Requirements:
- Add new event type to SSE broadcast
- Include all relevant task info for UI rendering
- Optionally push to cloud if connected (for remote board visibility)

Files:
- internal/tickboard/server/server.go - Add broadcastTaskStatus method
- internal/tickboard/server/tasks_watcher.go - Call broadcast on changes

Test:
- Connect SSE client, modify task file, verify event received
acceptance_criteria: SSE clients receive task-status events when tasks change
